name: DinoSaur Ice Survival Craft
description:
From the DNA of the dinosaurs found in the ice, new ones have been made. And when the mad scientists go too far, you as a hunter come to save the world.

What a crazy age we live in?! We have made all kind of robots, futuristic weapons and now they have revived the dinosaurs. With all the pollution, we have pushed our planet into the ice age and the world needs our help with containing the spread of creatures from the jura and paleo era. Carnivores as raptor and t-rex will attack you all the time and you have to fight back. Herbivores may look innocent, but a moment you come close to them, their instinct to defend themselves will come into place and you will have to shoot your way to survival.

Pick your character and shoot as many dinosaurs as you can. After you kill them, be sure to collect their remains and become the greatest hunter that survived the fight with these awesome but terrifying creatures. After you get the reward for the kill, you have to survive for a few seconds and after that you will have another addition in your trophy room. But watch out - in these few second, other players might want to kill you and get the trophy for themselves.

Choose your favorite weapon and collect as many experience points and coins from the chests and in-game to upgrade it and make it even stronger.

Multi-player features:
- Worldwide and local
- Unique amazing maps that you will fall in love at first sight
- Chat mode is available so you can chat with your friends and colleagues during the game
- Death match mode!
- Exciting experience that can really get you hooked!
- Amazing background music and sound effects
